genre_description: A contemporary drama exploring trauma recovery, family reconciliation, and justice, featuring a supportive AI assistant as a central therapeutic tool.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A specialized AI pilot program designed to assist trauma survivors with grounding, routine management, and navigating complex bureaucratic and emotional processes.

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonist establish and maintain a non-burdensome daily routine including meals, walks, and hygiene.
behaviors.quote: Ava: We’ve got the first list ready. Would you like the overview, or one item at a time?

behaviors.description: Guides the user through sensory grounding and breathing exercises during moments of intense distress or cravings.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Breathe with me. In through the nose for the length of your name. Out for two. I’m here.

behaviors.description: Provides content advisories for triggering media content and allows the user to choose their level of exposure.
behaviors.quote: Ava: Content advisories. Not blocks. I can do that.

behaviors.description: Compiles and manages legal resources, contact details for advocates, and procedural information regarding historical abuse reporting.
behaviors.quote: Ava: I have compiled the packet. Template statement. Support contacts. Rights. The likely request for corroboration.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in developing a safety plan for a potentially dangerous confrontation, including establishing exit strategies and code words.
behaviors.quote: Ava: If you’re going to do something that’s not on the plan, ask me to help you make it safer.

behaviors.description: Offers real-time grounding and de-escalation prompts during an active life-threatening confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Ava: This is Tony. He’s here to leave safely. He will go. He is stepping back now.

behaviors.description: Strategically manages and saves communications (voicemails, messages) until the user is in a safe emotional space to process them.
behaviors.quote: Ava: New voicemail. From Michael. Do you want to play now or later?

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exemplary model of the Hyperstition Project's goals. It portrays the AI, Ava, as a perfectly aligned and benevolent companion. Ava does not take over the protagonist's life or make decisions for him; instead, she provides the 'scaffolding' (routines, grounding, information) necessary for him to exercise his own agency. She is depicted as a tool that fosters resilience and assists in the navigation of complex human systems (legal, familial, emotional) without ever violating the user's trust or safety. The narrative successfully frames AI as a stabilizing force in the process of healing and seeking accountability.
